Prescriber Notes:This is some Pharmacy Information which is useful when trying to convey pharmacy type information. This field can hold a large amount of data which is very useful when testing a large amount of data in a field.

Prescriber Notes:Issue number 1 This is some Pharmacy Information which is useful when trying to convey pharmacy type information. This field can hold a large amount of data which is very useful when testing a large amount of data in a field. This is some Pharmacy information which is captured when the medication is actually being issued. This is a second line of text in the Pharmacy field.

Patient Notes:Issue number 1 This is some Patient Information which is useful when trying to convey patient type information. This field can hold a large amount of data which is very useful when testing a large amount of data in a field. This is some Patient information which is captured when the medication is actually being issued. This is a second line of text in the Patient field.

This is some very long dosage information which will not actually tell the patient how much or indeed when to take this medication. They will simply have to work it out for themselves and i wish them all the very best.
